H0.text: of which country is sofia the capital city. Greece

H1.text: of which country is sofia the capital city. Serbia

H2.text: of which country is sofia the capital city. Romania

H3.text: of which country is sofia the capital city. Bulgaria

A4.text: Sofia is the capital and largest city of Bulgaria.

A5.text: Sofia was selected as the capital of the Third Bulgarian State in the next year, ushering a period of intense demographic and economic growth.
